SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.repository

Interface FlightRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
JdbcFlightRepository
public interface FlightRepository
Repository interface for flight data access operations. Defines methods for performing CRUD operations and specific queries related to flights.

    • findAll

      List<FlightModel> findAll()
      Retrieve all flights.
      Returns:
      List of all flights

    • findById

      Optional<FlightModel> findById(Long id)
      Find a flight by its database ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The database ID to search for
      Returns:
      Optional containing the flight if found, empty Optional otherwise

      Find a flight by its flight number.
      Parameters:
      flightNumber - The flight number to search for
      Returns:
      Optional containing the flight if found, empty Optional otherwise

      Find flights by status.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to search for
      Returns:

    • findByOrigin

      List<FlightModel> findByOrigin(String origin)
      Find flights by origin airport.
      Parameters:
      origin - The origin airport code
      Returns:
      List of flights departing from the specified airport

    • findByDestination

      List<FlightModel> findByDestination(String destination)
      Find flights by destination airport.
      Parameters:
      destination - The destination airport code
      Returns:
      List of flights arriving at the specified airport

    • findByAirlineCode

      List<FlightModel> findByAirlineCode(String airlineCode)
      Find flights by airline code.
      Parameters:
      airlineCode - The airline code
      Returns:
      List of flights operated by the specified airline

    • findByAssignedAircraft

      List<FlightModel> findByAssignedAircraft(String aircraftRegistration)
      Find flights by assigned aircraft.
      Parameters:
      aircraftRegistration - The aircraft registration number
      Returns:
      List of flights assigned to the specified aircraft

    • save

      FlightModel save(FlightModel flight)
      Save a flight to the database. If the flight has no ID, it will be inserted as a new record. If it has an ID, the existing record will be updated.
      Parameters:
      flight - The flight to save
      Returns:
      The saved flight with generated ID (for new records)

    • deleteById

      void deleteById(Long id)
      Delete a flight by its database ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the flight to delete

    • deleteByFlightNumber

      boolean deleteByFlightNumber(String flightNumber)
      Delete a flight by its flight number.
      Parameters:
      flightNumber - The flight number of the flight to delete
      Returns:
      true if flight was deleted, false if not found

    • existsByFlightNumber

      boolean existsByFlightNumber(String flightNumber)
      Check if a flight exists with the given flight number.
      Parameters:
      flightNumber - The flight number to check
      Returns:
      true if a flight exists with the flight number, false otherwise

    • countByStatus

      int countByStatus(String status)
      Count flights by status.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to count
      Returns:
      The number of flights with the specified status

    • countByStatusNotIn

      int countByStatusNotIn(List<String> statuses)
      Count flights excluding specified statuses.
      Parameters:
      statuses - The statuses to exclude
      Returns:
      The number of flights not having the specified statuses

    • countAll

      int countAll()
      Count all flights.
      Returns:
      The total number of flights
